p: To map the m 6A modification status in the EV71 RNA genome, MeRIP-Seq was performed ( 5, 46). Several m 6A peaks were identified across the EV71 RNA genome (Figure 1D), which were located in the VP, 3D and 2C coding region, suggesting that EV71 RNA is marked by m 6A during infection. Collectively, our results demonstrated that EV71 RNA is modified at m 6A during infection.
